title: Fenzo
subtitle: eCommerce
description: Fenzo is an e-commerce website focused on wedding decorations and rentals. Developed using Next.js & TailwindCSS.

title: Memorization Association
subtitle: LMS
description: Memorization Association is a website where users can submit exams with the ability to take breaks, and keep updated with company news and photo gallery. Website is Multilingual (English, Arabic).

title: Vela
subtitle: Chat App
description: Vela is a private realtime chat application built for companies using React.js and MUI, featuring to-do lists, event management, and video/voice calling. The app is multilanguage and has both dark and light mode.

title: Fulink
subtitle: mini ERP
description: Fulink is a mini ERP system which is built using React.js, based on the (Fuse React Template) to ensure a scalable and professional structure. Implemented a role- and permission-based access system (SuperAdmin, Admins, Company Users) and integrated key third-party libraries such as Google Maps, Zod, and others.
